D1 and D2.without relying on: so many manually - designed features and external resources

achieves.from sentence: 1 ) Feature - based SVM is still a strong baseline , our best model achieves competitive results on D1 and D2 without relying on so many manually - designed features and external resources .

best performance.compared to using: only one of the two proposed approaches

integrated full model over all.from sentence: 4 ) The integrated full model over all achieves the best performance compared to using only one of the two proposed approaches .

more helpful.on: restaurant domain ( D1 , D3 , and D4 )

proposed target representation.from sentence: 5 ) The proposed target representation is more helpful on restaurant domain ( D1 , D3 , and D4 ) than laptop domain ( D2 ) .

all other neural baselines.from sentence: 2 ) Compared with all other neural baselines , our full model achieves statistically significant improvements ( p < 0.05 ) on both accuracies and macro - F1 scores for D1 , D3 , D4 .

LSTM + ATT.from sentence: 3 ) Compared with LSTM + ATT , all three settings of our model are able to achieve statistically significant improvements ( p < 0.05 ) on all datasets .
